body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Willie Lopez. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Willie, I'm interested in learning more about your current offers on SUVs.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Wonderful! May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Janet Rodriguez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janet. Could you please provide me with your email address so I can send you our latest offers?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, my email is janet.rodriguez@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janet. One more thing, could you tell me your contact number just in case we have upcoming events or exclusive promotions?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my number is five five five, eight six seven, five three zero nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Excellent, thank you for that information. I'll make sure you're the first to know about any special SUV deals.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Janet. Have a wonderful day and don't hesitate to reach out for any help!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Willie Lopez and the customer's name is Janet Rodriguez.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
